text: Rubble (20 May 1988- 3 July 2020) was a domestic cat owned by Michelle Foster of Exeter, Devon, England. Foster bought the cat as a kitten on or near his 20th birthday. Rubble, a Maine Coon-type cat, turned 31 in May 2020 and was from 3 January 2020 until his death the world's oldest verified living cat. Rubble died on 3 July 2020, aged 31.World's oldest cat dies aged 31 as heartbroken owner pays tribute ==References== Category:1988 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Individual cats
title: Rubble (cat)
